data.name: Schwarzerblitz - Bearsus Collaboration Costumes
data.detailed_description:
Hibernation is over!

Directly from Bearsus, the grizzly fighting game with bearly any controls, Tiger and Graf get an official El Poderoso skin! Sure, they won't elbow drop like him, but they'll bring a bit of his luchador flavour to the table!

Important Note

To use the El Poderoso DLC costume for Graf, you need first to have unlocked Graf Shabeel by either:
  • clearing the game's arcade mode with Tiger Sambiong OR
  • answering YES to the initial "unlock all characters" prompt OR
  • clearing the story episode "End of the Beginning" OR
  • using one of the cheat codes listed in the Discussion threads.

data.short_description: Directly from Bearsus, the grizzly fighting game with bearly any controls, Tiger and Graf get an official El Poderoso skin! Sure, they won't elbow drop like him, but they'll bring a bit of his luchador flavour to the table!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel i5 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4400
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: This DLC pack requires around 4MB of disk space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 (4th generation or higher)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia Geforce 740M
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
